android.widget
类 RelativeLayout.LayoutParams

java.lang.Object
  android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams
      android.view.ViewGroup.MarginLayoutParams
          android.widget.RelativeLayout.LayoutParams
包容类：
RelativeLayout
public static class RelativeLayout.LayoutParams
extends ViewGroup.MarginLayoutParams

Per-child layout information associated with RelativeLayout.

字段摘要
 boolean alignWithParent
          When true, uses the parent as the anchor if the anchor doesn't exist or if the anchor's visibility is GONE.
 
从类 android.view.ViewGroup.MarginLayoutParams 继承的字段
bottomMargin, leftMargin, rightMargin, topMargin
 
从类 android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams 继承的字段
FILL_PARENT, height, layoutAnimationParameters, width, WRAP_CONTENT

字段详细信息

alignWithParent

public boolean alignWithParent
When true, uses the parent as the anchor if the anchor doesn't exist or if the anchor's visibility is GONE.

方法详细信息

debug

public String debug(String output)
从类 ViewGroup.LayoutParams 复制的描述
Returns a String representation of this set of layout parameters.

覆盖：
类 ViewGroup.LayoutParams 中的 debug
参数：
output - the String to prepend to the internal representation
返回：
a String with the following format: output + "ViewGroup.LayoutParams={ width=WIDTH, height=HEIGHT }"

addRule

public void addRule(int verb)
Adds a layout rule to be interpreted by the RelativeLayout. This method should only be used for constraints that don't refer to another sibling (e.g., CENTER_IN_PARENT) or take a boolean value (RelativeLayout.TRUE for true or - for false). To specify a verb that takes a subject, use addRule(int, int) instead.

参数：
verb - One of the verbs defined by RelativeLayout, such as ALIGN_WITH_PARENT_LEFT.
另请参见：
addRule(int, int)

addRule

public void addRule(int verb,
                    int anchor)
Adds a layout rule to be interpreted by the RelativeLayout. Use this for verbs that take a target, such as a sibling (ALIGN_RIGHT) or a boolean value (VISIBLE).

参数：
verb - One of the verbs defined by RelativeLayout, such as ALIGN_WITH_PARENT_LEFT.
anchor - The id of another view to use as an anchor, or a boolean value(represented as RelativeLayout.TRUE) for true or 0 for false). For verbs that don't refer to another sibling (for example, ALIGN_WITH_PARENT_BOTTOM) just use -1.
另请参见：
addRule(int)

getRules

public int[] getRules()
Retrieves a complete list of all supported rules, where the index is the rule verb, and the element value is the value specified, or "false" if it was never set.

返回：
the supported rules
另请参见：
addRule(int, int)
